imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

adaptSecurityContext.description: Adapt the securityContext sections of the deployment to make them compatible with Openshift restricted-v2 SCC: remove runAsUser, runAsGroup and fsGroup and let the platform use their allowed default IDs. Possible values: auto (apply if the detected running cluster is Openshift), force (perform the adaptation always), disabled (do not perform adaptation)

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

enableServiceLinks.description: Whether information about services should be injected into all pods' environment variable

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployments/statefulsets

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployments/statefulsets

digest.description: Milvus image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

existingSecret.description: Name of a secret containing the Milvus password

existingSecretPasswordKey.description: Name of the secret key containing the Milvus password

existingConfigMap.description: name of a ConfigMap with existing configuration for the default configuration

extraConfigExistingConfigMap.description: name of a ConfigMap with existing configuration for the Dashboard

forceRun.description: Force the run of the credential job

digest.description: PyMilvus image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

existingSecret.description: Name of the existing secret containing the TLS certificates for initJob.

cert.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'cert' key different from the default (client.pem)

key.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'key' key different from the default (client.key)

caCert.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'caCert' key different from the default (ca.pem)

keyPassword.description: Password to access the password-protected PEM key if necessary.

backoffLimit.description: set backoff limit of the job

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the credential init job

extraCommands.description: Extra commands to pass to the generation job

drop.description: List of capabilities to be dropped

type.description: Set container's Security Context seccomp profile

enabled.description: Enabled credential init job pods' Security Context

sysctls.description: Set kernel settings using the sysctl interface

fsGroup.description: Set credential init job pod's Security Context fsGroup

extraEnvVars.description: Array containing extra env vars to configure the credential init job

extraEnvVarsCM.description: ConfigMap containing extra env vars to configure the credential init job

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Secret containing extra env vars to configure the credential init job (in case of sensitive data)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Array of extra volume mounts to be added to the jwt Container (evaluated as template). Normally used with `extraVolumes`.

resourcesPreset.description: Set container resources according to one common preset (allowed values: none, nano, micro, small, medium, large, xlarge, 2xlarge). This is ignored if initJob.resources is set (initJob.resources is recommended for production).

resources.description: Set container requests and limits for different resources like CPU or memory (essential for production workloads)

enabled.description: Enable startupProbe on Data Coordinator containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Mount Service Account token in pod

allowExternalEgress.description: Allow the pod to access any range of port and all destinations.

extraIngress.description: Add extra ingress rules to the NetworkPolicy

extraEgress.description: Add extra ingress rules to the NetworkPolicy

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for data coordinator nodes

existingConfigMap.description: name of a ConfigMap with existing configuration for the default configuration

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

podLabels.description: Extra labels for data coordinator pods

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `data coordinator.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `data coordinator.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `data coordinator.affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `data coordinator.affinity` is set

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains

rollingUpdate.description: Data Coordinator statefulset rolling update configuration parameters

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the Data Coordinator pod(s)

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for the ServiceAccount

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation

controlledResources.description: VPA List of resources that the vertical pod autoscaler can control. Defaults to cpu and memory

maxAllowed.description: VPA Max allowed resources for the pod

minAllowed.description: VPA Min allowed resources for the pod

updateMode.description: Autoscaling update policy Specifies whether recommended updates are applied when a Pod is started and whether recommended updates are applied during the life of a Pod

minReplicas.description: Minimum number of Milvus Data Plane replicas

maxReplicas.description: Maximum number of Milvus Data Plane replicas

sessionAffinity.description: Control where client requests go, to the same pod or round-robin

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Data Coordinator service Load Balancer sources

externalTrafficPolicy.description: Data Coordinator service external traffic policy

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for Milvus

apiVersion.description: Force Ingress API version (automatically detected if not set)

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress record

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `attu.ingress.hostname` parameter

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

extraHosts.description: An array with additional hostname(s) to be covered with the ingress record

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraTls.description: TLS configuration for additional hostname(s) to be covered with this ingress record

extraRules.description: Additional rules to be covered with this ingress record

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

type.description: Set container's Security Context seccomp profile

resourcesPreset.description: Set container resources according to one common preset (allowed values: none, nano, small, medium, large, xlarge, 2xlarge). This is ignored if initJob.resources is set (initJob.resources is recommended for production).

resources.description: Set container requests and limits for different resources like CPU or memory (essential for production workloads)

servers.description: List of hostnames of the external etcd

port.description: Port of the external etcd instance

user.description: User of the external etcd instance

password.description: Password of the external etcd instance

existingSecret.description: Name of a secret containing the external etcd password

existingSecretPasswordKey.description: Key inside the secret containing the external etcd password

enabled.description: Enable TLS for etcd client connections.

existingSecret.description: Name of the existing secret containing the TLS certificates for external etcd client communications.

cert.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'cert' key different from the default (tls.crt)

key.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'key' key different from the default (tls.key)

caCert.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'caCert' key different from the default (ca.crt)

keyPassword.description: Password to access the password-protected PEM key if necessary.

existingSecret.description: Name of an existing secret resource containing the S3 credentials

existingSecretAccessKeyIDKey.description: Name of an existing secret key containing the S3 access key ID

existingSecretKeySecretKey.description: Name of an existing secret key containing the S3 access key secret

enabled.description: Enable TLS for external S3 client connections.

existingSecret.description: Name of the existing secret containing the TLS certificates for external S3 client communications.

caCert.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'caCert' key different from the default (ca.crt)

protocol.description: Kafka listener protocol. Allowed protocols: PLAINTEXT, SASL_PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL and SSL

existingSecret.description: Name of the existing secret containing a password for SASL authentication (under the key named "client-passwords")

existingSecretPasswordKey.description: Name of the secret key containing the Kafka client user password

enabled.description: Enable TLS for external Kafka client connections.

existingSecret.description: Name of the existing secret containing the TLS certificates for external Kafka client communications.

cert.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'cert' key different from the default (tls.crt)

key.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'key' key different from the default (tls.key)

caCert.description: The secret key from the existingSecret if 'caCert' key different from the default (ca.crt)

keyPassword.description: Password to access the password-protected PEM key if necessary.

existingSecret.description: Name of an existing secret containing the MinIO® credentials

defaultBuckets.description: Comma, semi-colon or space separated list of MinIO® buckets to create

extraCommands.description: Extra commands to run on MinIO® provisioning job

type.description: MinIO® service type

replicaCount.description: Number of Kafka controller eligible (controller+broker) nodes

client.description: Kafka svc port for client connections

extraConfig.description: Additional configuration to be appended at the end of the generated Kafka configuration file.

protocol.description: Kafka authentication protocol for the client listener
